title: Newly Registered Companies in India on 30-05-2025
summary: There were a total of 858 companies (Private and Public Limited Companies) registered in India on 30 May, 2025, as per the records of the Ministry of Corporate Affairs, whilst the number of LLPs registered was 346 on the same day.
content:
Company and LLP Registrations in India - May 21, 2025  

Company and LLP Registrations in India - May 30, 2025

There were a total of 858 companies (Private and Public Limited Companies) registered in India on 30 May, 2025, as per the records of the Ministry of Corporate Affairs, whilst the number of LLPs registered was 346 on the same day.

Amongst all the RoC's in India, most of the companies were from RoC-Delhi that is 132 companies. If we compare the number of companies registered state wise, Maharashtra tops the list with 149 companies. As far as districts are concerned Mumbai had the maximum number of companies registered, a total of 49 companies on 30 May, 2025

If we look at LLP registrations, most of the LLPs were from RoC-Mumbai, that is 61 LLPs. If we compare the number of companies registered state wise, Maharashtra tops the list with 92 LLPs. As far as districts are concerned, Mumbai had the maximum number of LLPs registered, a total of 36 LLPs on 30 May, 2025

Company and LLP Registrations in India - May 24, 2025

There were a total of 841 companies (Private and Public Limited Companies) registered in India on 24 May, 2025 as per the records of Ministry of Corporate Affairs whilst the number of LLPs registered were 38 on the same day.

Amongst all the RoC's in India, most of the companies were from RoC-Delhi that is 106 companies. If we compare the number of companies registered state wise, Maharashtra tops the list with 133 companies. As far as districts are concerned Bengaluru Urban had the maximum number of companies registered, a total of 44 companies on 24 May, 2025

If we look at LLP registrations, most of the LLPs were from RoC-Mumbai that is 9 LLPs. If we compare the number of companies registered state wise, Maharashtra tops the list with 12 LLPs. As far as districts are concerned Bengaluru Urban had the maximum number of LLPs registered, a total of 5 LLPs on 24 May, 2025

title: Newly Registered Companies in India on 23-05-2025
summary: There were a total of 451 companies (Private and Public Limited Companies) registered in India on 23 May 2025, as per the records of the Ministry of Corporate Affairs, whilst the number of LLPs registered was 119 on the same day.
content:
Company and LLP Registrations in India - May 23, 2025  

Company and LLP Registrations in India - May 23, 2025

There were a total of 451 companies (Private and Public Limited Companies) registered in India on 23 May, 2025 as per the records of Ministry of Corporate Affairs whilst the number of LLPs registered were 119 on the same day.

Amongst all the RoC's in India, most of the companies were from RoC-Delhi that is 63 companies. If we compare the number of companies registered state wise, Maharashtra tops the list with 55 companies. As far as districts are concerned Hyderabad had the maximum number of companies registered, a total of 24 companies on 23 May, 2025

If we look at LLP registrations, most of the LLPs were from RoC-Mumbai that is 18 LLPs. If we compare the number of companies registered state wise, Maharashtra tops the list with 27 LLPs. As far as districts are concerned Bengaluru Urban had the maximum number of LLPs registered, a total of 11 LLPs on 23 May, 2025

title: Newly Registered Companies in India on 21-05-2025
summary: There were a total of 1085 companies (Private and Public Limited Companies) registered in India on 21 May, 2025, as per the records of the Ministry of Corporate Affairs, whilst the number of LLPs registered was 315 on the same day.
content:
Company and LLP Registrations in India - May 21, 2025

There were a total of 1085 companies (Private and Public Limited Companies) registered in India on 21 May, 2025 as per the records of Ministry of Corporate Affairs whilst the number of LLPs registered were 315 on the same day.

Amongst all the RoC's in India, most of the companies were from RoC-Delhi that is 166 companies. If we compare the number of companies registered state wise, Maharashtra tops the list with 207 companies. As far as districts are concerned Mumbai had the maximum number of companies registered, a total of 59 companies on 21 May, 2025.

If we look at LLP registrations, most of the LLPs were from RoC-Delhi that is 46 LLPs. If we compare the number of companies registered state wise, Maharashtra tops the list with 65 LLPs. As far as districts are concerned Kolkata had the maximum number of LLPs registered, a total of 25 LLPs on 21 May, 2025.
